title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master modern web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Build real-world projects and launch your career as a full-stack developer.

lessons.title: Introduction to Web Development
lessons.content: Welcome to the Complete Web Development Bootcamp! In this lesson, we'll explore what web development is, the different roles in web development, and what you'll learn throughout this course. We'll also set up your development environment and write your first lines of code.

lessons.title: HTML Fundamentals
lessons.content: Dive into HTML (HyperText Markup Language), the backbone of every website. Learn about semantic HTML, document structure, essential tags, forms, and best practices for writing clean, accessible HTML code.

lessons.title: CSS Styling and Layout
lessons.content: Master CSS to make your websites beautiful and responsive. Learn about selectors, the box model, flexbox, grid layout, animations, and modern CSS techniques to create stunning user interfaces.

lessons.title: JavaScript Basics
lessons.content: Learn JavaScript, the programming language of the web. Understand variables, data types, functions, control flow, and DOM manipulation to make your websites interactive and dynamic.

lessons.title: React Fundamentals
lessons.content: Get started with React, the most popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Learn about components, props, state, hooks, and how to build modern, reactive web applications.

quiz.question: Which CSS property is used for layout positioning?
What is the correct way to declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is React primarily used for?
Which HTML tag is used for the largest heading?

title: Python Programming Masterclass
description: Learn Python from scratch to advanced level. Master data structures, algorithms, OOP, and build real applications including web scrapers and data analysis tools.

lessons.title: Python Basics and Setup
lessons.content: Get started with Python! Install Python, set up your IDE, and write your first Python program. Learn about variables, data types, and basic syntax.

lessons.title: Control Flow and Functions
lessons.content: Master control structures like if-else statements, loops, and functions. Learn how to write reusable code and organize your programs effectively.

lessons.title: Data Structures in Python
lessons.content: Explore Python's powerful built-in data structures: lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets. Learn when and how to use each one effectively.

lessons.title: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.content: Dive into OOP concepts: classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. Build robust, maintainable code using OOP principles.

lessons.title: Working with Files and APIs
lessons.content: Learn to read and write files, work with JSON data, and interact with web APIs. Build practical applications that work with real-world data.

quiz.question: What is the correct file extension for Python files?
Which keyword is used to define a function in Python?
What data structure uses key-value pairs?
Which method is called when an object is created?

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of great user interface and experience design. Master Figma, create beautiful mockups, and understand user psychology.

lessons.title: Introduction to UI/UX Design
lessons.content: Understand the difference between UI and UX design. Learn about the design thinking process and how to approach design problems systematically.

lessons.title: Design Principles and Color Theory
lessons.content: Master fundamental design principles: contrast, balance, hierarchy, and proximity. Learn color theory and how to create harmonious color palettes.

lessons.title: Typography and Layout
lessons.content: Explore typography fundamentals, font pairing, and creating effective layouts. Learn about grid systems and responsive design principles.

lessons.title: Figma Mastery
lessons.content: Master Figma, the industry-standard design tool. Learn about components, auto-layout, prototyping, and collaborative design workflows.

lessons.title: User Research and Testing
lessons.content: Learn how to conduct user research, create user personas, and perform usability testing. Make data-driven design decisions.

quiz.question: Which color scheme uses colors opposite on the color wheel?
What is the purpose of a wireframe?
Which design principle creates visual interest?

title: Data Science with Python
description: Master data science fundamentals with Python. Learn pandas, NumPy, data visualization, and machine learning basics to analyze and interpret data.

lessons.title: Introduction to Data Science
lessons.content: Explore what data science is, its applications, and the skills you need. Set up your data science environment with Jupyter notebooks.

lessons.title: NumPy for Numerical Computing
lessons.content: Master NumPy arrays and operations. Learn about broadcasting, vectorization, and efficient numerical computations.

lessons.title: Data Manipulation with Pandas
lessons.content: Learn pandas for data manipulation and analysis. Work with DataFrames, handle missing data, and perform complex data transformations.

lessons.title: Data Visualization
lessons.content: Create stunning visualizations with Matplotlib and Seaborn. Learn to tell compelling stories with data through effective charts and graphs.

lessons.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.content: Get started with machine learning using scikit-learn. Build your first predictive models and understand fundamental ML concepts.

quiz.question: What is the main data structure in pandas?
Which library is used for numerical computing?
Which chart is best for showing trends over time?
What is feature engineering?
options: Creating new features from existing data

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build native mobile apps for iOS and Android using React Native. Learn navigation, state management, and how to publish apps to app stores.

lessons.title: Getting Started with React Native
lessons.content: Set up your React Native development environment. Understand the difference between React and React Native, and create your first mobile app.

lessons.title: Core Components and Styling
lessons.content: Learn about React Native core components: View, Text, Image, ScrollView. Master styling with StyleSheet and create responsive layouts.

lessons.title: Navigation and Routing
lessons.content: Implement navigation in your app using React Navigation. Learn about stack, tab, and drawer navigators to create smooth user flows.

lessons.title: State Management with Redux
lessons.content: Master state management in React Native apps using Redux. Learn about actions, reducers, and the Redux store.

lessons.title: API Integration and Deployment
lessons.content: Connect your app to backend APIs, handle authentication, and learn how to deploy your app to the App Store and Google Play.

quiz.question: What is React Native?
options: A framework for building native apps

quiz.question: Which component is used for scrollable content?
Which platforms does React Native support?
What is a React Native component?

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: Learn comprehensive digital marketing strategies including SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, and paid advertising to grow your business.

lessons.title: Introduction to Digital Marketing
lessons.content: Understand the digital marketing landscape, key channels, and how to create an effective digital marketing strategy.

lessons.title: SEO Fundamentals
lessons.content: Master search engine optimization. Learn keyword research, on-page SEO, link building, and technical SEO best practices.

lessons.title: Social Media Marketing
lessons.content: Create effective social media strategies across platforms. Learn about content creation, engagement, and social media analytics.

lessons.title: Content Marketing Strategy
lessons.content: Develop a content marketing strategy that attracts and engages your audience. Learn about blogging, video content, and email marketing.

lessons.title: Paid Advertising (PPC)
lessons.content: Master paid advertising with Google Ads and Facebook Ads. Learn campaign setup, targeting, optimization, and ROI measurement.

quiz.question: What is content marketing?
options: Creating valuable content to attract audience

quiz.question: Which platform is best for B2B marketing?

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn essential cybersecurity concepts, ethical hacking, network security, and how to protect systems from cyber threats and attacks.

lessons.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
lessons.content: Understand the cybersecurity landscape, common threats, and the importance of security in today's digital world.

lessons.title: Network Security Basics
lessons.content: Learn about network protocols, firewalls, VPNs, and how to secure network infrastructure against attacks.

lessons.title: Ethical Hacking Introduction
lessons.content: Get started with ethical hacking. Learn about penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and security tools.

lessons.title: Cryptography and Encryption
lessons.content: Understand cryptographic principles, encryption algorithms, and how to implement secure communication systems.

lessons.title: Security Best Practices
lessons.content: Learn industry best practices for securing applications, managing passwords, and protecting sensitive data.

quiz.question: What is a firewall?
options: A security system that monitors network traffic

quiz.question: What is the purpose of encryption?

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Master Amazon Web Services (AWS). Learn about EC2, S3, Lambda, and how to build scalable cloud applications and infrastructure.

lessons.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
lessons.content: Understand cloud computing concepts, service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), and get started with AWS.

lessons.title: EC2 and Compute Services
lessons.content: Master EC2 instances, load balancers, and auto-scaling. Learn how to deploy and manage applications on AWS.

lessons.title: S3 and Storage Solutions
lessons.content: Learn about S3 buckets, storage classes, and data management. Implement backup and disaster recovery solutions.

lessons.title: Serverless with Lambda
lessons.content: Build serverless applications using AWS Lambda. Learn about triggers, API Gateway, and event-driven architecture.

lessons.title: Database Services and RDS
lessons.content: Master AWS database services including RDS, DynamoDB, and Aurora. Design scalable database architectures.

quiz.question: What is EC2?
options: A virtual server in the cloud

title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
description: Dive deep into AI and ML. Learn neural networks, deep learning, natural language processing, and build intelligent applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to AI and ML
lessons.content: Explore the fundamentals of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Understand different types of ML and their applications.

lessons.title: Neural Networks Fundamentals
lessons.content: Learn about artificial neural networks, activation functions, and backpropagation. Build your first neural network from scratch.

lessons.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
lessons.content: Master deep learning using TensorFlow and Keras. Build convolutional neural networks for image recognition.

lessons.title: Natural Language Processing
lessons.content: Explore NLP techniques for text analysis, sentiment analysis, and language models. Work with transformers and BERT.

lessons.title: AI Ethics and Deployment
lessons.content: Understand AI ethics, bias in ML models, and how to deploy ML models in production environments.

quiz.question: What is a neural network?
options: A computing system inspired by biological neurons

quiz.question: What is deep learning?
options: ML with neural networks having multiple layers

title: Blockchain Development
description: Learn blockchain technology, smart contracts, and decentralized applications. Build on Ethereum and explore Web3 development.

lessons.title: Introduction to Blockchain
lessons.content: Understand blockchain technology, distributed ledgers, consensus mechanisms, and cryptocurrency fundamentals.

lessons.title: Smart Contracts with Solidity
lessons.content: Learn Solidity programming language for Ethereum smart contracts. Write, test, and deploy your first smart contract.

lessons.title: DApp Development
lessons.content: Build decentralized applications (DApps) using Web3.js and React. Connect smart contracts to user interfaces.

lessons.title: NFTs and Token Standards
lessons.content: Create NFTs and understand ERC-20, ERC-721, and ERC-1155 token standards. Build a token marketplace.

lessons.title: DeFi and Security
lessons.content: Explore decentralized finance protocols. Learn about smart contract security and common vulnerabilities.

quiz.question: What language is used for Ethereum smart contracts?

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Create 2D and 3D games using Unity engine. Learn C# programming, game physics, animation, and publish games to multiple platforms.

lessons.title: Unity Interface and Basics
lessons.content: Get familiar with Unity editor, understand GameObjects, components, and create your first game scene.

lessons.title: C# Programming for Unity
lessons.content: Learn C# basics for game development. Understand scripts, variables, functions, and Unity-specific programming concepts.

lessons.title: 2D Game Development
lessons.content: Create a complete 2D platformer game. Learn about sprites, animations, physics, and collision detection.

lessons.title: 3D Game Mechanics
lessons.content: Build 3D games with character controllers, camera systems, and environment design. Master Unity's 3D tools.

lessons.title: UI and Game Publishing
lessons.content: Design game UI, implement menus and HUD, and learn how to build and publish your game to various platforms.

quiz.question: Which language is primarily used in Unity?
What is a GameObject in Unity?

title: Photography Masterclass
description: Master photography from basics to advanced techniques. Learn composition, lighting, editing, and build a professional portfolio.

lessons.title: Camera Basics and Settings
lessons.content: Understand your camera, learn about aperture, shutter speed, ISO, and how to shoot in manual mode.

lessons.title: Composition Techniques
lessons.content: Master composition rules: rule of thirds, leading lines, framing, and how to create visually compelling images.

lessons.title: Lighting and Exposure
lessons.content: Learn about natural and artificial lighting, golden hour photography, and exposure techniques for perfect photos.

lessons.title: Photo Editing with Lightroom
lessons.content: Master Adobe Lightroom for photo editing. Learn color grading, retouching, and developing your unique style.

lessons.title: Building Your Portfolio
lessons.content: Learn how to curate your best work, create a professional portfolio, and market yourself as a photographer.

quiz.question: What is the rule of thirds?
What is golden hour?
options: Time shortly after sunrise or before sunset
